channel.title: HKG:488 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:488 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Builder Lai Sun Seeks to Sell 50% Stake in Hong Kong’s CCB Tower
item.description: Lai Sun Development Co. is seeking to sell its 50% stake in Hong Kong office building CCB Tower, according to people familiar with the matter, as the builder looks to shed assets.

item.title: Builder Lai Sun Seeks to Sell 50% Stake in Hong Kong’s CCB Tower
item.description: Lai Sun Development Co. is seeking to sell its 50% stake in Hong Kong office building CCB Tower, according to people familiar with the matter, as the builder looks to shed assets.
